name: Magia Fortuny
overview: Magia Fortuny is a Polish video game based on the TV show Wheel of Fortune. The players take turns guessing letters to form a word or a saying. The game can be played with up to three human players. During their turn the players can spin the wheel, guess a consonant, buy a vowel or guess a password. The game faithfully reflects the principle of the TV show, introducing the most famous taunts of the Polish presenter conducting the program. After completing the round the player may visit the Magic of Fortune shop and spend the earned money.
